content.rendered:
UNIQUE DESIGNER BAGS

Since a lot of us have been staying at home more and wearing sweats, I have been looking to invest in a fun, unique designer bag to lift my mood and my look a little bit. Unique accessories, bags, and shoes can take an outfit from so-so to a fantastic runway-inspired look.

Even if you are just wearing jeans and a white t-shirt, adding a designer bag can really make your look really pop.

These are some of the new designer bags I have my eye on:

The top pink floral bag is from Bernadette. The top clear bag is from Cult Gaia. The snake print bag is from Rajina Pyo. The pink bag is from Little Liffner. Crystal bag is from FWRD.com. The green bag is from The Sant. The cream tote to the left is from Cult Gaia.

 

A few more options: The top beaded white bag is from Boyy. The top right small neon bag and the small pink bag are Jacquemus. The cream bag is from Yuzefi. The yellow feather bag is from Attico. The pink bag on the bottom is from Louise Et Cie. The bottom blue quilted bag is from Bottega Veneta.

Are you in the market for a new designer bag? What styles are you liking the most this season?

I know that 2020 has turned into a very weird, difficult year for many of us, and I just wanted to say that I am truly hoping that it turns around soon. I hope that you are all staying safe, taking care of yourselves, and remembering that you are not alone.

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!

XO XO, Dionne  

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here.
